results.title: Senior Blockchain Platform Engineer
results.description:
If you enjoy solving challenging technical problems, having an impact on a fast-paced remotely managed engineering team and like being surrounded by inspiring co-workers, then keep reading!

We are bringing to life fast, trust-less, decentralised computation. The Nillion team are looking for talented software engineers to build a new paradigm in decentralised computing with the aim of redefining network computation on private data. We build using open source platforms, technologies and tools, including LINUX, Terraform, Rust, BASH and others.

As a Blockchain Platform Engineer at Nillion you will architect, design, build, test and deploy infrastructure related to the blockchain layer used within the NMC Network as well as integrate blockchain technologies from the greater ecosystem with our systems.

We work in an environment where tangibility and flexibility are key attributes that help us innovate. Our engineering team embodies those qualities, bringing clarity and direction to help move new ideas forward. If you enjoy keeping up to speed on current technological trends, and have an interest in crypto and security - get in touch!

We are a remote-first organisation looking to build an engineering team primarily focused on European and US East Coast time zones. Some travel may be required, but only occasionally.

Requirements

  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
  • 3+ years experience working with one or more of the existing Blockchain Technologies e.g. Ethereum (or other EVMs), Solana, Polkadot
  • 5+ years of programming experience with at least one modern language such as Java, C++, C#, Go or Rust
  • 5+ years of experience contributing to the architecture and design (architecture, design patterns, reliability and scaling) of new and current systems
  • Experience running blockchain nodes

‚ÄúNice to Have‚Äù Requirements:

  • Experience with blockchain infrastructure systems (e.g. Oracles, Bridges, RPCs)
  • Experience writing smart contracts (e.g. in Solidity, Vyper, Rust, etc)
  • Experience with Rust, Golang, node.js
  • Experience with Docker/Kubernetes/Openshift technologies
  • Experience with Terraform for infrastructure-as-code
  • Knowledge and understanding of cryptocurrency markets, ecosystem and ethos
  • Experience in financial markets / software / DeFi
  • Knowledge and experience in the design and development of distributed cryptographic principles and protocols (e.g. ZKP or SMPC)
  • Experience building and operating online services and fault-tolerant distributed systems at scale

Engineering Culture and Perks:

We expect technical members of the Nillion team to have or be the following:

  • Comfortable with a fast-paced startup environment
  • Ability to manage multiple priorities
  • Have excellent troubleshooting skills with the ability find and integrate knowledge quickly
  • Excellent work ethic with the ability to work independently and with a bias towards action
  • Be incredibly technically curious about how things work or how to do things a better way
  • Good at providing valuable feedback on architecture or code reviews with team members
  • Ability to work with a cross-functional and globally distributed team
  • Good at coaching and being coached
  • Macro-to-micro versatility: strategic mindset coupled with a keen attention to detail
  • Great at providing simple and extensible abstractions to complex systems

¬†

Benefits

We offer the following perks as part of employment with Nillion:

  • Flexible working hours to accommodate lifestyles and a globally distributed team
  • Competitive Salary and Token Compensation; acquire Nil tokens as part of your bonus
  • Make a big impact as a early contributor to an incredible founding team
  • Work on new problems in an incredible emerging and dynamic field
  • Learn from systems engineering, cryptography, and finance domain experts in a mentorship-oriented work culture
  • You don‚Äôt need to be in an office or at a desk to have an impact anymore! We are fully remote, but value regular meet-ups.

If this sounds like it could be a good fit and you‚Äôd like to find out more, hit apply below and submit your CV! If you don‚Äôt have a CV to hand, you can always download your LinkedIn profile and use that (click ‚ÄúMore‚Ä¶‚Äù on your LinkedIn profile then ‚ÄúSave to PDF‚Äù üí°).

Nillion is committed to shaping a better world in all that we do. Our global team is built based on respect, inclusivity, diversity and excellence.

results.title: Senior Designer
results.description:
Senior Designer

You're a creative mind that balances craft and business impact. Where others see visual roadblocks, you see all kinds of space to elevate the work. You are scrappy, especially without big client budgets, but never settle for ‚Äúgood enough.‚Äù You know the power of well-crafted decks and sales materials. Your opinions about design as a driver of impact for clients is strong, you can move quick and smart at the same time and sell your ideas with confidence.¬†

And, just maybe, you're at a stage in your career where you're ready to build something from the ground up and help redefine how B2B marketing shows up in the world.

If this is you, then this role at SalientMG (SMG), a leading independent B2B agency focused on exceptional marketing for growth-stage startups and raising the visibility of the people who lead them,, is for you.¬†

We're looking for a Senior Designer to join our growing team. You'll apply your creativity and design expertise to startups and tech companies across various sectors, including Martech, Edtech, Fintech, Retailtech, eCommerce, digital marketplaces, and emerging technologies like drones and Web 3.0.

The talent in this dynamic position develops work that is highly visible, creating, in some cases, a company's first real brand presence. Additionally, this role is a critical piece in continually elevating SMG's presence online and in the sales process. It supports video, social, content and anything that demands a unique design punch. This role lets you fly creatively; nothing is off the table. You'll identify, develop, create and sell through design concepts that tell powerful stories, create deep connections, and drive meaningful results for genuinely interesting and up-and-coming brands.¬†

The successful candidate has a combination of deep design experience, a strong point of view and the ability to organize and design all work from conception to delivery, including for SMG. We want to evolve B2B marketing, find more creative ways into the conversation and, yes, be recognized for our work. Since this is a newly created role, we're excited to see the vision, range of ideas and skills you bring to the position.

The Manager of Design Excellence reports to the Vice President, Digital and works closely with other SMG teammates and contractors.

Responsibilities may include, but are not limited to:

  • Manage the design process, from concept to completion (including execution) of projects for clients along with the SMG brand. This may include brand books, design overhauls and any design-centric elements.
  • Establish the look and feel for various, omnichannel interfaces, including websites, mobile devices, apps, social media, presentations, print and digital collateral, etc. for both SalientMG clients and for internal SalientMG needs.
  • Work within brand guidelines to create layouts that reinforce a brand's style or voice through its visual touchpoints.
  • Design static logos, icons, illustrations and infographics, as well as video post-production editing footage, video editing graphics, transitions, motion design, and light animation experience.
  • Create effective processes, systems and briefing materials to get the most out of client requests and managing creative and/or design output.
  • Collaborate with the VP of Business Development on building effective proposals and creative pitch strategies.¬†
  • Facilitate creative and design sessions with clients to develop campaigns.
  • Project management for design-centric projects, including budgeting and costs.
  • Manage¬† vendors, production companies and freelancers for any creative and/or design projects.
  • Develop a diverse list of freelancers and other vendors, with an emphasis on diverse suppliers.

¬†

What we're looking for:

  • Experience: At least six (6) years of experience as design leader, especially in a digital environment. Agency experience, especially working on brand campaigns, is a plus.¬†
  • Industry Experience: Experience in the tech/SaaS and/or marketing space is preferred but we're more interested in your passion for the transformative impact of technology on businesses and people.
  • Technical Expertise: Expert proficiency in Adobe Creative Cloud suite and other creativity tools.¬†
  • Cross-Functional Experience: A proven track record of flexibility, working across departments. Experience in digital marketing, growth marketing, product marketing, and communications is a plus.
  • Collaboration: You excel in a remote environment and can successfully collaborate with other senior professionals and external contractors.
  • Initiative: You understand the startup/entrepreneurial mindset and can operate with speed and agility while still prioritizing quality results.
  • Excellence: You set the bar high and put your best work in front of team members and clients.
  • Communication: Excellent written, visual, verbal and presentation skills. You can deliver thoughts and direction clearly and concisely.
  • Growth Mindset: You consistently bring complementary skills and expertise to the team and are always willing to teach and learn from team members.¬†
  • Curiosity: This is a huge industry. We want people to explore, ask questions and tinker.¬†
  • Organization: You value organization, efficiency and transparency and always strive to keep clients and team members in the loop.

¬†

SMG's Culture

  • We are independent and happily leave the red tape behind.
  • We strike a solid balance between being strategic and executing with excellence for our clients.
  • We are diverse and inclusive. We respect different viewpoints and educational backgrounds and ensure pay parity for employees and contractors.
  • We grow and promote our people, and help them develop their personal brands in the market. Though not expected, we compensate teammates for business referrals.¬†
  • We work remotely and transparently while avoiding micromanaging, schedule-policing and presenteeism.¬†
  • Our open time-off policy means you take the time you need. We believe hard workers need time to recharge.

¬†

Requirements:

  • Please include a link to your portfolio of at least five (5) samples of different types of campaign/projects you've worked on.
  • The individual in this role can be based in the United States or Canada.

¬†

About Us

SalientMG is a strategic marketing firm based in New York City with team members across North America. We are senior marketers, not traditional consultants. We collaborate with our clients to identify their salient points‚Äîwhat makes their business truly remarkable. B2B tech companies partner with us to launch, accelerate, or streamline their marketing strategy and programs. Since 2013, growth-stage tech companies such as Verizon, Etsy, Ogury, Ubermedia and Rovio have relied on us to create market differentiation and accelerate growth. Our clients are accepted by referral only.¬†

SalientMG provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, genetic information or any other status protected by federal law. In addition to federal law requirements, SalientMG complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation, and training.

¬†

results.title: Product Designer
results.description:
We heard you might be looking for a new opportunity! Cartloop might be the perfect stop for you. Just in case you haven't heard, growing an eCommerce brand often equals automating human communication. But automation means losing a key piece of the shopping experience: a meaningful connection with customers.

Cartloop is an eCommerce startup that's changing the way businesses and people interact. We are enabling brands to grow by scaling 1:1 conversations with a human touch without increasing the headcount.

The coolest thing is we are growing quickly and possibly have the perfect position for you.

¬†

Team and culture

Cartloop is helping brands win the hearts of their customers by providing a tool that drives human engagement at scale. To provide a missing pillar of core eCommerce experience, we're building a team of people who are ready to take on some of the most interesting challenges in the industry.

Here are some of our core values to give you a sense of who we are as a team:

  • Ownership. We build, we celebrate and we take responsibility even when things don't pan out.

  • Set the pace. We move fast, take risks, and chase big outcomes wherever possible. We‚Äôre creating an environment where we can act fearlessly, a consensus isn‚Äôt needed for every action, and experimentation and failure (plus learning) are key.

  • Autonomy. We unblock ourselves, focus on solutions and work towards our goals.

  • Honor execution. Fewer meetings, less of the stuff things that don't make an impact, more action. Move fast and focus on execution instead of talking.

  • Continuous feedback. We are open to feedback and make a habit of sharing feedback with others.

  • Writing > talking. We‚Äôre creating a culture where people can do their best critical thinking and use data to solve problems.

¬†

What you'll be doing

As a Product Designer you will have significant impact on our product and company's future. Some of the things you'll be working on include:

  • Build user journeys, Figma prototypes, and high-quality visuals for our product's UI.

  • Design products and features end-to-end. From brainstorming and ideation to final QA.

  • Lead a range of design activities, including problem definition, user flow examples, component usage, content and QA (visual and technical).

  • Evolve and maintain our design system.

  • Collaborate with the product engineering team. Brainstorm, ideate, design, and iterate new product ideas with engineering and product teammates.

  • Lead customer interviews. Develop customer profiles and accurately define customer problems. Use this work to actively guide your design efforts. Share insights with your team.

  • Continuously identify and resolve UX problems. Improve the UX based on user feedback and your own research.

  • Develop a strategic design roadmap for the product. Understand systems and flows, and prioritize design improvements to yield the maximum customer impact in the shortest amount of time.

  • Use data to support your decision-making process.

Who you are

  • You have 4+ years of digital product design experience.

  • You know Figma like the back of your hand.

  • You can work cross-functionally to go from idea to shipped experience.

  • You have strong product design skills (including stellar portfolio).

  • You know that the devil is in the details.

  • You thrive under minimal supervision while assuming full ownership of the outcome.

  • You're not afraid to wear multiple hats when needed.

  • You thrive in fast-paced environments.

Impress us even further

  • You have worked in the martech or eCommerce space.

  • You have some frontend experience so you can implement your own design and guide frontend engineers (CSS, HTML, JSS)

¬†

Benefits

‚òïÔ∏è Flexible work schedule

üèñ Unlimited paid time off to take control over your

üìö Educational budget and training programs to fuel your growth

¬†

Why Cartloop

üöÄ Opportunity to grow by being part of a high-growth startup from its early stages

üôè Join a company where efficiency, autonomy, and low ego are core beliefs

üôå You are part of a multicultural team executing fast with zero politics

‚ö°Ô∏è High-impact role, as you apply your expertise and contribute to all areas of our business
